Text.Page: Report what is happening in Granarkus to Seir so that the Federation can act accordingly. Let's go to Velika and find Commander Seir.

After reporting to Commander Seir about the situation in Granarkus, he says that Manahan seems to be pulling the strings behind the scenes, just as the goddess Velik had suspected.
You go and report to the goddess Velik. She is sure that Manahan is responsible for these events and decides to take a look at his memories.
You go to the Dakuryon Depot to find the totem containing Manahan's power and the mysterious crystal, and bring them to the goddess Velik.

! I'm glad you're here. I was about to call you.

By the look on your face, this is something serious. What has happened?You report on the situation in Granarkus.

Hmm, a phenomenon like this occurred in Granarkus... It seems to have something to do with what the goddess Velik was talking about.
If you ask me, Manahan is responsible for the goings-on in Granarkus. Regardless, the goddess Velik has been waiting for you regarding Manahan.
Go see the goddess Velik quickly.

Ah, !
The goddess Velik is waiting for you.
Go to Velik's Sanctuary and meet the goddess.

I've been expecting you.
Manahan's once weak energy is growing stronger by the day.
If it carries on like this, Arborea will be in big danger.You report what has happened in Granarkus to the goddess.

Manahan will have something to do with that too.
We need to look at Manahan's memories to find out what he is up to.

I will dispatch you to the Dakuryon Depot to find an object there that contains his power.

Let me know when you're ready.

! I received Commander Seir's message and waited here for you.
We need to find an object here that contains Manahan's power, is that right?
Manahan's eyes have already turned up here, so we're bound to find an object with his power too.
Let's go in.

If you are after the forbidden power, stop!

Manahan was cursed by the ancient gods. His power is not desirable.

If you are the guardian of Arborea, you must be vigilant.

Monitor Manahan and his new power carefully.

I'm glad you found the object... but what kind of crystal is that?
The shield seems to have been there to prevent Manahan's power from falling into the wrong hands.
I don't think Dakuryon is responsible for this. But who is then?"It would be better to ask the goddess Velik."

We must bring Manahan's Totem to the goddess Velik as quickly as possible.
I will send you directly to Velik's Sanctuary.

Let me know when you're ready.

I've been waiting for you.
I can sense Manahan's energy in this object.
We can use it to see his memories and uncover what he is plotting.
